data.eml:eml: A new genus and species (Cornucollis gen. n. masoalensis sp. n.) of praying mantis from northern Madagascar (Mantodea, Iridopterygidae, Tropidomantinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brannoch, Sydney K., Svenson, Gavin J. (2016): A new genus and species (Cornucollis gen. n. masoalensis sp. n.) of praying mantis from northern Madagascar (Mantodea, Iridopterygidae, Tropidomantinae). ZooKeys 556: 65-81, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.556.6906, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.556.6906
